sqlMap.insert: insert into Tbl_Stl_Cleaning_Detail (id, version, plTxTraceNo, mchtOrderId, createdDatetime, lastUpdatedDatetime, lastUpdatedBy, orderAmount, transTime, refundOrderId, refundOrderAmt, refundAmt, refundFee, mchtSettleFee, reMark, transType, userName, balance, backBalance, mchtNo, mchtName, cleanStatus, creator, deleted) values (#id#, 1, #plTxTraceNo#, #mchtOrderId#, #createdDatetime#, #lastUpdatedDatetime#, #lastUpdatedBy#, #orderAmount#, #transTime#, #refundOrderId#, #refundOrderAmt#, #refundAmt#, #refundFee#, #mchtSettleFee#, #reMark#, #transType#, #userName#, #balance#, #backBalance#, #mchtNo#, #mchtName#, #cleanStatus#, #creator#, #deleted#)
